charges.charge_disposition: IMPR. by comm to the CUSBP for a term of: 228 MOS as to cts. 2s, and 6s, IMPR 60 MOS. as to ct 3s; 120 MOS as to cts. 7s. Cts. 2s, 6s, and 7s to run conc, 3s cons to 2s. The Court makes the recomm to the Bureau of Prisons: The Court recomm the deft b e confined in an inst that has a mental health or a psychiatric prog where the deft may receive treatment for his cond. The deft is remanded to the custody of the USMS. Spec Assmt .00, for cts. 2s, 3s, 6s, and 7s. Supvd rel. 5 YRS.
